originalText.text: Beautifully designed, elegant, and spacious, with the right amount of quirk. Our room came with a costume closet! The owners could not have been more welcoming and kind, although they may be addicted to electrolytes. Not that thatâ€™s a bad thing? I guess they just really wanted to make sure we were hydrated. The definition of above and beyond.

originalText.text: I would give 60 Morton 6 stars if I could. Incredible amenities, very attractive clientele, and they bring in up-and-coming DJs from Europe that deliver all the vibes. Also provide plentiful free snacks.
